article.Heading: Watch: What is on the cards this Budget?
article.Summary: The titans of Indian industry here at the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) at the CII headquarters in New Delhi takes us through what we can expect or should expect from the Budget and what the Budget can deliver.
article.Body:
The buzz and excitement around the Union Budget 2016 is slowly starting to pickup. CNBC-TV18 calls this as the Now or Never Budget; we believe this is a window of opportunity for the Modi government to try and accelerate its growth agenda. The titans of Indian industry here at the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) at the CII headquarters in New Delhi takes us through what we can expect or should expect from the Budget and what the Budget can deliver.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos
